message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $95. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I can't accept $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe that $95 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can find a way to agree on this.
